content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Setup at (1,1) and (3,1)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) containing iron plates
- Additional burner inserter and wooden chest setup at (5.5,2.5) and (5.5,3.5)

### Copper Smelting Setup at (2,7) and (4,7)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5) containing copper plates

### Research Lab Setup
Consists of:
- Two labs connected to electricity network (id 3754)
- Labs contain automation science packs

### Power Generation System at (2.5,35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler with water
- PipeGroup connecting boiler to steam engine with steam
- Connected to electricity network (id 3754)

### Unused Pump
- Standalone offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) with no connections

### Electricity Distribution
- Electric pole network (id 3754) connecting various structures
- Multiple poles spanning from (3.5,21.5) to (13.5,33.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to place entities without having them in inventory
- Always check if required items are in inventory before attempting to place them
- Craft necessary buildings before trying to place them (as seen with assembling machine placement attempt)

### Resource management
- Boiler has no fuel - ensure coal is loaded into power generation structures
- Several furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warning - ensure proper resource supply

### Connection errors
- Offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) has no fluid connections - ensure pumps are properly connected to pipe networks when placed
